title: ++The Gifting Fairy++ (NEW THREAD)
body:
UPDATE:**Event is over guys** and thanks again, congrats to all the winners. Some still haven't excepted my friend request. So I will wait **2 days** for you to accept. If not I will send the gifts to another player. But ya, please leave me feedback at this thread and thanks again  xD
**FEEDBACK:**
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/R4fTPvyW-the-gifting-fairyfeedback-thread

Thank you all so much for participating in this, it makes me so happy to see others happy <333 Please spread the word to anyone you think might want a chance at a free skin. Just to clarify, this will be going on for **7 days**(6/17-6/23). The whole Pool Party Event just happened to be great timing. I've been planning on doing this for over 2months so I'm happy that I can finally do this. Thanks again everyone!!!!

This is how it works

Post your IGN and the skin you want

Ill add 10 **RANDOM(seriously, its random ask my cat)** people everyday and send the skin the next day.

Do not try to add me in game or you will automatically be disqualified.

**You do NOT have to repost your info everyday! Once its on here your entered EVERY day <3
**
I saw a lot of threads ASKING for skins, so I thought Id start one to GIVE them away.

Have a great day and good luck :)

_**DAY 7 6/23/2015 EVENT IS OVER!!!!!**_

1)MidnightRondo

2)SKT T1 Godyr

3)naadeko

4)Verdauga Green

5)EzraCHuuuun

6)Thousandwings

7)Sadistic Beast

8)Moon Howler Wolf

9)crasherX8

10)Bloodlusst

If you see your name on this list but haven't gotten a friend request, let me know!

--I am on **NA so I CAN NOT gift to any other region**. I'm sorry I totally should have put this on my post to begin with. Sorry again!!!

I think we can all agree that Miss Wake n Bake is by far one of the most generous people in the League of Legends community and deserves a pat on the back. She worked hard during the past week, and even though RIOT opposed some of her actions, she was able to persevere through it just to be able to hand out free skins to us and asked for nothing in return. Don't be sad or angry if you did not win anything this event, because I am sure that she will be hosting more events in the future! I did not win anything in this event either, but I am excited for any future events that she may hold in the future and will definitely be following her!

Thank you for running this event, Miss Wake N Bake, I appreciate everything you've done for the community and I am sure many other feels the same way.

See you guys in the next one,

The only beacon of shining grace within this rotting land of poor fashion sense would come to be shone upon me in the form of an angel! Perhaps it was... an Arch-angel. The Archduke Nasus skin; a symbol of prosperous farming! Oh, should I come to possess such a treasure, I would continue my quest to grace the top lane with _inescapable charm_!
